srtFormatDesc: Select the format template to use when converting SRT to ASS, corresponds to environment variable SRT_2_ASS_FORMAT
srtStyleDesc: Specify the subtitle style when converting SRT to ASS, corresponds to environment variable SRT_2_ASS_STYLE
restoreRenamedFontDesc: When enabled, automatically restores fonts that have been renamed to their original font names, corresponds to environment variable RENAMED_FONT_RESTORE
clearEmbeddedFontsDesc: When enabled, deletes embedded fonts in subtitle files before performing subsetting
downloadFontsDesc: When enabled, extracts fonts from subtitles and packages them for download
clearAfterDownload: Clear Successfully Processed Files After Download
clearAfterDownloadDesc: After downloading, clears files in the list that have been successfully processed
strictModeDesc: When enabled, performs a font check first. If any font is missing, subsetting will not proceed
languageDesc: Select the display language of the interface
srtFormatPlaceholder: Please enter or select a format
srtStylePlaceholder: Please enter or select a style
